questiontext.text:
For a Mixed Design ANOVA examining whether the performance of schoolchildren differs between 3 subjects (literature, essay writing, mathematics) and whether those differences vary between male and female students, two assumptions about the variances are apply: the homogeneity of variances and sphericity.

Complete: The assumption of homogeneity of variances implies that the variance of * …** is equal to the variance of … .

answer.text: Women’s scores in each of the three subjects in mathematics - scores in essay writing
Scores in literature - scores in mathematics in mathematics - scores in essay writing
Scores in literature - scores in mathematics of men in each of the three subjects
The scores of women in each of the three boxes scores of men in each of the three boxes
